Actually, the storages of the Iron Fist have about anything you need. 
They don't exactly have torpedos, but those could be made with 
modified missiles and stuff. It has lots of waterproof weapons, 
though.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: its fine Carnage.
> 
> :::The Protectrons/Maximus Prime/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
> Lynx/Orion/Wheeljack:::
> 
> ::My Maximals land and look for targets::
> ~~~~~
> ::Torca fires 2 charges at Greven and Demise's shuttle::
> ~~~~~
> ::Ratchet fires 15 shots from each gun and 2 tusk missles at Greven 
and 
> Demise's shuttle::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe fires 2 missles and 25 shots at Greven and Demise's 
shuttle::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from each gun at Endbringer::
> ~~~~~
> ::Orion fires 2 missles at Endbringer::
> ~~~~~
> ::The Protectrons look to each other and know what they must do::
> Chromedome: Protectrons, unite!
> ::They combine to form the gestalt warrior Maximus Prime.  Maximus 
Prime 
> fires 2 missles from each shoulder gun(4 guns) at Endbringer::
> ~~~~~
> ::Wheeljack thinks for a second::
> Wheeljack: No, i dont think we have any submarinal weapons, but its 
a great 
> idea. lets do that.
